ston pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas mi zad pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems

dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud pa rnams

yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i don shes pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du

rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa yin pa nas ji ltar na de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni

'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar ro/ /rab tu 'bar ro/ /kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ro/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs so/ /kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/

gti mug gi mun pas mun nag tu gyur to snyam mo/ /de 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam sems te/ de de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la rtog go/ /chos thams cad la rtog pas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /chos

thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos rnams sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad yang dag pa ji

lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems so/ /de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog ste/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to

snyam du sems so/ /de ltar de blo zhib mo dang ldan pas sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa tsam gyis don shes so/ /des don shes pas don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs so/ /don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin

du rab tu rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo / /de kho na mthong bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar bar byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa nas/ de kho na la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan

na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go/ /chos thams cad sems can med pa dang / srog

med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/

rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/ /'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/ /chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/ /'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang /

gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa dang / shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa yang dag pa ma yin pa las yongs su brtags pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o/ /'di ni

chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa de ni rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul ba de ni rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o/ /gang chos nyid ston pa de ni rigs pa'o/ /

de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs par spobs pa rnams zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /

bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa phal

la med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyis ma non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ yeng

yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba ma yin/ tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ rtsub pa ma yin/ mi gsal ba'i spobs pa can ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'dar 'dar po ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs pa'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi spobs pa ni zhan pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi 'jigs mi skrag ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi dngangs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

spobs pa ni yeng yeng po med pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yeng yeng por 'gyur ba yin te/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni don dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang

bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gtsug lag gi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ gtsug lag thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ /byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ /byang

chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra ba'am/ gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba lta bur dus dang bral ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin/ skabs shes pa yin no/ /byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba/ mi snyan pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni rtsub pa yin gyi/ gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi gsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'

rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams

yin/ don du smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshungs par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrug pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba ni/ 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' don du smra ba ni

tshig ran pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos su smra ba ni phan par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /

byang chub sems dpa' mi ngoms pa ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang rgyags pa dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni ri mor byas shing chos bstan pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs

par 'gyur ba med pa ni ngang tshul des pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pa mang bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni dga' ba'i tshig gis sems can rnams mgu

bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston te/ zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ ri mo med pa rnams la ma yin/ ma dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/

g.yo dang sgyus glags pa rnams la ma yin/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / phrag dog dang / ser snas glags pa rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston te/ rigs

kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab pa yang med sems can rnams la ri mor mi byed pa yang med/ sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur pa'o zhes btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can ci 'dra ba rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to/ /sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / g.yo med pa rnams dang /

sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi 'chos pa rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la chags pa dang bral ba rnams dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams dang / legs par ston

nus pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu dag la rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams

chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub

pa'i phyir chos ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/ /byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub yang

dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so/ /nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa spang ba yang mi dmigs so/ /skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang skyo ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs

pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa yang mi dmigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya

ba'i phyir chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston

kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs so/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de ming des yod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos

ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams ni chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten/ tha snyad la brten/ brtags pa la brten te/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la ming du 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsog go/ /gsob bo/ /gang gsog dang gsob de la don dam

pa med do/ /gang la don dam pa med pa de te slu ba'i chos so/ /gang zhing slu ba'i chos de ni byis pa skye bo slu ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no// //'phags pa dkon

mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po lnga pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs las kyang

mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos

kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la gzugs med pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la/ sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su'ang

'brang la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su'ang 'brang la lam las kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos

bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/

shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes

rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' zhing rangs te/ de la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de la brten te gnas so/ /de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad

yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pas na sgrib pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa med cing lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de shin tu

yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa yin no/ /de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba yin no/ /stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang bas dmigs pa'i lta bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de dmigs pa'i lta ba dang bral bas lam du 'jug go/ /de lam

du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig

so/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang mi slu ba de ni yang dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gis rig pa yin te/ 'di ni yi ge dag

gis gdams par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni yi ge thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig gi spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ spros pa

thams cad dang bral ba blang ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ phye ba dang / btsums pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog ge thams cad dang bral ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/

mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma dang bral ba/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam par

shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/ zhi ba/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyi so so rang gis rig pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma gos pa dang / rnam par dag pa/ gya nom pa/ mchog /dam pa/ phul/ rtag pa/

brtan pa/ ther zug /mi 'jig pa'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi dbyings 'di ni 'dug pa kho na'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob nas sems can dag kyang chos nyid 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do

snyam ste/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dka' ba brgya dag byed pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/ /gnyis su med pa'i dbyings zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ji ltar mngon du bgyi/ ji ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs

kyi bu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis mngon du bya'o/ /rang gis rig par khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo / /lus kyis ni mngon du byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig

pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na dpe nyon cig /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'brog chen por dpyid kyi zla ba tha ma la/ mi la la zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/ de yang dpyid

kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/ kye skyes bu kho bo dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen na/ gang na mtsho 'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing gang chu bsil ba dang rnyog pa med pa/ gsal bas

gang ba yod de/ gang du bdag tsha ba dang / skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa/ lam mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu

sngon chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du kye grogs po lam 'di nas lam kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus na mtsho 'am/

lteng ka'am/ rdzing bu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des chu thos ma thag

dang / bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ram/ chu de'i bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas/ des chu der zhugs

te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa tsam dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig

pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/ /de la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba de ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig so/ /mi dpyid kyi tsha bas yongs su gdungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can

rnams kyi tshig so/ /lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa/ chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig so/ /chu bsil zhing dang la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ don dam pa'i chos nyid

kyi tshig so/ /yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig /rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang / gya nom pa dang / shin tu

zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las brtsams te/ bsngags pa brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de'i bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig gis shing thog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang

ma myangs pa zhig myangs par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing thog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci mi des shing thog gi ro des rang

gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis ji ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis so so rang gis rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos

'di khong du chud pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di thob par bgyi ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de dag

gis chos 'di thob par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul pa rnams yin no/ /

bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang

rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ stong pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ don dam pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/

de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis stong pa nyid du dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid la gnas pa'ang mi dmigs/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis med par yang mi ltung ngo / /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems

dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad

dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par shes

pa mi dmigs pa rnams yin/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi dmigs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad

rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gnas pa'ang de 'dra na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra bar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam

gyis mi khyab bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na/ sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam/ tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur/ mi

dmigs kyi/ tha mar na dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog ge pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa/ dmigs pa can

thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ gzhal ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag

la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu skabs phyes khyod dris shig /byang chub sems

dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag bstod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsung na/ de ji ltar chos kyi rje bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag la bstod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so

legs so/ /khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin du dris so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa dang / rnyed pa'i zil gyis non pa

dang / bkur sti'i zil gyis non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa'am/ kha gsag byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bdag bstod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dang ba dang /

rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bstan pa'i skal ba yod par 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur te/ de yang de dag la yun ring por don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ma 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni rgya chung ngu la mos pa/ dman tshegs la mos pa/ shes

rab chung ba/ dad pa chung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus brtan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan tan gyis sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta

ste/ dper na sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur/ sa'i phyogs de na 'ang sman pa gcig pur zad de gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang mi shes pa dang / de nas sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug

bsngal ba/ nad kyis nyen pa/ sman la mi mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis/ bdag gis de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du kye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste/ nad la mkhas pa'o nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa'o/ /sman la mkhas

pa'o zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing yid ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to/ /de nas sman pa des sems can de dag gso zhing nad de zhi bar byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sman pa de bdag

la bstod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po chen po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad la mkhas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pa/ nyon

mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas pa/ chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin yang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan dang / bsngags

pa bdag nyid brjod de/ de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i che ba thos nas/ yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to/ /de nas de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po

chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad de/ chos kyi sman chen po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag

la bdag nyid bstod pa mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /

brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral

ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par spyod do/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /bcu

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyi tse ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan

pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams

yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug

bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dag mthong na/ byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing rtsol/ brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ dka' bar spyod pa brgya

dag kyang byed do/ /de dag chos thob nas sems can rnams la phan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sems can ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gzhog par byed/ tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems

'khrugs pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed kyang / sems can gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba dag gis nyen kyang byang chub la phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang

chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i btson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag gis 'khor

ba'i dpyang thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal lo zhes rab tu dga'

ba skyed do/ /bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ji ltar rdul kyang mi snang ba de ltar bcom mo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni 'jig rten

gnas pa/ yun ring po nas gnyid la sred pa'i snyoms pas yongs su zin pa/ gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nang nas sad pa yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang rnam par sad par bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag nyid ni ngan 'gro dang / ngan song dang / log par ltung ba thams

cad las rnam par grol ba yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gar yang

'khyam zhing lam la mi mkhas la/ lam mi shes shing yul mi shes pas lam stor ba rnyed do zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'

dga' ba la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis

rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /

lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang / yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed kyi

sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smas par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma byung

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la btang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar gyur to zhes btang snyoms su

gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shi 'pho

ba'ang ston/ skye ba'ang ston/ btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par 'byung ba'ang ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul ba'ang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang ston/ chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang ston/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'ang ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam

pa nas shi 'pho ston pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad

las khyad zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi phul du byung ba/ mi mnyam pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis ma gos ma chags pa shi 'pho bar mthong na/ rtag pa'i 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du

shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa yod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod rangs pa yod kyang yul la mngon par zhen pas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dong /

mi rten bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bzhugs la/ bdag cag kyang 'khod de/ dus kyang ring du yod kyis labs kyis 'dong bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag gi bag med pa bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho ston te/

de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'pho mthong nas skyo ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing / de dag skyo bar gyur nas bag med pa mi byed de/ bag yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis byang

chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa de dag gi mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu sems can

gang dag byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang /

slas kyi nang na 'dug pa ston to/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu sems

can gang dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba'i spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa/ de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub

sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba

ston la/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin du mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang /

rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom pa yod de/ de dag de las bzlog pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /sems can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de las gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya ba ston te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgra sna tshogs dang / ca co sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag thams cad med cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhi bar

'gyur te/ de dag gis mthu de mthong na/ bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par dam bca'

la de dag gis 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa yod pa de dag tshar gcad pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams la lam bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ka shi'i grong rdal du song nas

chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag 'dul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa'

dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam

par spangs pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir ldog pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya ba

la brtson pa rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis

sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa/ tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la gnod pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang

chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa yin te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis byol song gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/

de dag tu skyes nas kyang byol song gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni gang ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des kyi nang du skye zhing de dag tu skyes nas kyang kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub par myong bar 'gyur ba

med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni gang du skyes pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa 'thob pa'i rkyen dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i log par lta ba'i rigs su mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa yin pas de dag

yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/ de dag tu skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du mi rung

bar 'gyur bar dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams bya ba la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing / bsnyen pa dang / bsten pa dang /

bsgoms pa dang / mang du byas pas dbang po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya ba de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na sems can blun pa/ rmongs pa/ lug

ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can/ skal ba med pa/ legs par bshad pa dang nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi shes pa/ phar mi shes pa/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi skye'i/

byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can dbang po rno ba/ dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa/ mkhas par bkur ba/ skal ba yod pa/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du

gyur pa/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi shes rab dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes pa du ma 'bras bu

med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs mkhas

pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dkon mchog gsum phun sum tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu

skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos kyang skyo ba mi mnga' ba dang / dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas de lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo bar 'gyur te/

skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos 'di dag spang ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang

chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med de drang zhing gya gyu med la sems dang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la yid gnyis dang / nem nur dang / the tsom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob

dpon 'chab pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed de mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang

zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po la gzhol/ theg pa chen po la 'bab/ theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed pa

rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshe rabs dran pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa rnams yin/

dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnams yin/ dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/ rnam par

shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dam pa'i chos la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod pa yin te/ de de'i

rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang / srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo / /klog go/ /kun chub par byed do/ /gzhan la yang rgya cher ston to/ /de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas 'di lta ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi tshul khrims rnam pa

gsum gyis tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin te/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa yin/ sgrib pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa

mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang bas sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ /sems mnyam par gzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa yin no/ /rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir

tshe rabs dran pa yin te tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran no/ /gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du rjes su dran no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub

sems dpa' tshe rabs rjes su dran pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / dran pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa

dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / gdud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang

zag chos smra ba rnams dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams

yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa

rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o/ /lta ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / cho ga nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'tsho ba nyams pa'i

gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim pa dang sten

pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pas na sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des gnas 'di dag rnam par spong ba'i tshe/ gang zag de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /khong khro ba'i sems dang /

brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni khams so sor bsten te/ bsten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis bsten pa yongs su spang bar sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos

bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid thob pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su

dag pa rnams yin/ lus rma med pa rnams yin/ lus legs par grub pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yin/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams yin/ lus zhi ba rnams yin/ lus nam

mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sa dang po la byang chub sems dpa' lus mnyam pa nyid thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus mi mnyam pa thams cad dang

bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /sa gnyis pa la byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i phyir lus yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /sa gsum pa la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba dang / gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i

phyir lus rma med pa 'thob bo/ /sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa 'thob bo/ /sa lnga pa la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos kyi lus 'thob bo/ /sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag

dka' ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba 'thob bo/ /sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob bo/ /sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad bral ba dang / nyon

mongs pa med pa'i phyir lus zhi ba 'thob bo/ /sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob bo/ /sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus 'thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes par bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi chos nyid la tha dad du bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus tha dad pas tha dad du bya ba

med de/ yon tan gyi mthus ni tha dad du bya ba yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha dad pas tha dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan gyi mthus tha dad du bgyi ba mchis pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus lus zhes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus su brjod pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gang lta bur yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid tha dad du blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na don gyi dbang 'di nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na byi dor ma byas pa'i nor bu rin po che

dang / byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po che nor bu rin po che zhes bya bar nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ji ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i mthu dang / yid du 'ong bas khyab par byed pa de ltar ni byi dor ma byas pas ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa'i 'od kyis khyab par byas te gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te/ byang chub sems

dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de tsam du khyab par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ni zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas/ zla ba nya ba'i bar gyi zla ba yang zla ba zhes

bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur zla ba nya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bcas te lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub

sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su brjod pa'i

mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig mod kyi/ yon tan gyi mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro

ba dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po de dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems

can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis

mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan

na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/ phyin par byed pa rnams yin/ brtan par bya ba rnams yin/ nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba rnams yin/ rgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/

tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen

pa'i grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / rgyal po chen po'i blon po dag gis bkur ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas

kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang /

gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'brog dgon par lam grogs kyi tshogs 'chan pas gtses

pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po'i nang na sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs nyon mongs pa'i 'chan pas gtses pa dag legs par bde zhing yongs su mi skyo bar phyin par byed pa

yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po la brten na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la brten na mu stegs can gzhan spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu ba rnams

'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni rgyal po dang / las byed pa'i mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems

dpa'i ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar chas te lam grogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba'i phyir 'brog dgon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/

grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar du rgyags phun sum tshogs pas 'brog dgon pa de nas legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing sems can lam grogs mang po dang de

'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por 'jug par 'dod la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i tshe bsod nams kyi rgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pas 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lta ste/ gser dang /

nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa mang po bsags shing phyogs su 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshogs

shin tu bsags shing 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta

ste/ nor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos

la dbang ba dang / ma log par smra bas sems can lam grogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ded dpon chen po ni grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded

dpon chen po rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga ba'ang rab tu shes/ lam bde ba'ang rab tu shes/ 'tsham pa'i lam yang rab

tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang / chu med pa yang rab tu shes/ lam gyi dgongs mal dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam gyis tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyog pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so/ /rigs kyi bu chos

bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems

dpa'i lam ston gyi nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to/ /nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam mi ston to/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam

mi ston to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam mi ston to/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa'i lam dang / stong pa

nyid kyi lam ston gyi/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag gi lam mi ston to/ /mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i lam ston gyi/ mtha' gnyis la gnas pa mi ston to/ /

sems g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi lam ston gyi g.yeng ba'i lam mi ston to/ /spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams la de bzhin nyid kyi lam ston gyi byis pa spros pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lam mi ston to/ /'khor ba la mngon par dga'

ba'i sems can rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam ston gyi 'khor ba'i lam mi ston to/ /lam gol bar zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la lam srol ma dod pa ma yin pa dang / tsher ma med pa'i lam ston gyi nyon mongs pa'i tsher mas gang ba'i lam mi ston to/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag

dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam ma log par ston pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /

tshor ba rnams dang / sems dang chos rnams dang / yul rnams dang / dgon pa rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang /

sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa rnams dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na

byang chub sems dpa' lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang lus dang ldan pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing yongs su spong ngo / /de 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas brtsams te/

yar la klad pa'i bar du lus kyi nyes pa la rtog go/ /lus la bdag med par yang rtog go/ /lus mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chu rgyus kyis glags pa dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / kha dog mi sdug par rtog ste/ de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ gang lus la

lus su 'dod pa dang / lus la 'dod chags pa dang / lus la dga' ba dang / lus la bdag gir 'dzin pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag mi 'byung ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis lus dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na lus dang ldan pa'i

chos rnams de nyid kyi dbang du 'gyur te/ de ltar na lus la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa'o/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ tshor ba gang ji snyed pa de dag

thams cad ni sdug bsngal na/ byis pa phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams ni bde bar 'dzin te/ byis pa rmongs pa rnams sdug bsngal la bde ba zhes bya bar 'dzin gyis 'phags pa rnams kyis ni thams cad sdug bsngal bar thugs su chud do snyam nas de spang ba'i phyir nan tan du byed do/ /

sems can gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god kyis bdag gis kyang de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam ste/ de de ltar rtog pas tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /de tshor ba dag la chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med cing de dag spang ba'i phyir rab

tu zhugs pa yin no/ /gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na tshor ba rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems 'di ni mi rtag

pa la rtag par mngon par dga' ba'o/ /sdug bsngal la bde bar mngon par dga' ba'o/ /bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par dga' ba'o/ /mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba'o/ /g.yo zhing mi brtan pa la myur du 'gyur ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'o/ /

ngan song rnams kyi sgo'o/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gzhi'o/ /bde 'gro rnams chud son pa'o/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyi rkyen du gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi

thog mar sems 'gro ste/ sems yongs su shes na chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten sems kyis bris pa ste/ sems ni sems kyis mi mthong ngo / /dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i las ni sems kyis bsags pa'o/ /sems ni

mgal me lta bur 'khor/ /sems ni rta ltar 'khyam pa yin/ sems ni nags kyi me ltar 'tshig /sems ni chu chen bzhin du skyed/ /de de ltar rtog pas sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ sems kyi dbang du mi 'gro'i sems nyid de'i dbang du 'gro ste/ sems de'i

dbang du gyur pas chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/

'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa dang / de dag la gnas pa gzhan dag la 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gnyen po la sten cing

de dag spang ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas chos de dag la sems gtong zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog ste/ chos de dag kyang yang dag par blangs shing gnas so/ /gzhan yang bslab pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

chos rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya

la chags par 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro ba'i sems kyang mi skyed de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de ltar bdag dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la chags pa skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni bdag byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas par

'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chags par gyur nas zhen par 'gyur ro/ /zhen nas rmongs par 'gyur ro/ /rmongs nas dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'i chos rnam par bsgom par mi 'gyur te/ de'i rgyus ngan song du 'gro bar gsungs so zhes de 'di snyam du de ltar bdag chos

gsog rnams la khong khro ba'i sems skyed pa ni bdag gi mi cha ste/ de ni bdag gi mi bzod pa dang / dang du mi len pa dang / khro ba kun nas ldang bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis ni smad par 'gyur/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni dpya bar 'gyur ro zhes de de ltar rtog

pas yul rnams la dran pa shin du nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/ yul rnams kyis mi smas shing rma byung bar mi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang bslab pa bcas pa de nyid la 'god de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang

chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ de 'di snyam du dgon pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /zhi bar rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /dgon pa la ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin

dang / dri za gzhan gyi sems mngon par shes pa dag kyang yod de/ de dag bdag gi sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams rab tu shes na/ bdag tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed cing sems pa de ni bdag gi mi cha'o snyam ste/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la

bya ba thams cad dang bral nas tshul bzhin du chos rnams la sems gtong zhing chos de dag la sgom pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang /

grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang /

rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gnas gang tshul dang mi 'dra zhing yongs su spang bar bya ba rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'thun pa de dag yongs su spong ngo / /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chang ma'i khyim 'am/ smad 'tshong gi khyim 'am/ rgyal

po'i pho brang ngam/ brgyan po'i gnas sam/ ra ro ba'i 'khor gyi tshogs sam/ gar mkhan dang / glu gar gyi gnas dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul dang mi 'dra ba de dag yongs su spang zhing / de dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas te/

de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / gzhongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa

dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dngos po nye bar bzung zhing / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la sems gtong ste/ ci nas kyang zhen par mi 'gyur/ sred

pa mi skyed/ chags pa mi skyed/ bdag gir mi byed/ nor du mi 'dzin/ bdag gir mi 'dzin pa dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams la phan par 'gyur ba de ltar gtong ste/ gal te yang de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i

gzhis grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal mi skye/ rgyags pa mi skye ste/ de 'di snyam du sems so/ /ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang las byung ba dang / gang

gis phyung ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur na/ de la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa/ yid brtan du mi rung ba dag la dga' ba'i sems

skyes pa'am/ khengs par 'gyur ba'am/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ mngon par

rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /gang ma byon pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs

pa de dag kyang bslab pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes de de ltar yid ches pas bslab pa rnams la nan tan du byed pa yin te/ brtson par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed cing shin tu rdzogs par byed pa yin

te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas pa la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la dran

pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams la dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de dag gang las byung ba dang / rkyen gang gis

byung ba'i gzhi yang rab tu shes te/ des de ltar shes nas 'byung ba de dang / rkyen de dag yongs su spong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad la

dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin no// //'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/

bam po drug pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa rnams yin/ sems dma' ba rnams yin/ yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa

rnams yin/ nyes par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ yon tan du lta ba rnams yin/ bdag la mi stod pa rnams yin/ gzhan la mi smod pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lha 'du ba rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang

chub sems dpa' yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pa yin pa nas/ ji ltar na lha 'du ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dad cing bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad cing yid ches pa yin/ de srog gi phyir yang yang dag

par blangs pa mi 'jig cing yang dag par blangs pa las mi 'gyur te/ de yang dag par blangs pa la brtan pas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / de sems dma' zhing nga rgyal med pa yin/ de nga rgyal med cing sems dma' bas phyag dar khrod pa ngan ngon yongs su bor ba skye bo thams cad dang mi

'thun pa dag sdud do/ /de dag bsdus nas 'khru bar byed do/ /de 'khru ba dang / klan pa dang / btsem pa dang / btso bar byed pa na kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing yongs su mi skyo ste/ yongs su mi skyo ba rkyen du byas nas ji tsam gyis don 'grub par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par de la zhen

par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni zhigs pa'o/ /kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni sbom pa'o/ /kye ma'o phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni shig mang ba ste/ lus la mi bde zhing rngul 'byin to zhes nyes par lta ba ma yin gyi/ phyag dar khrod pa 'di dag ni drang srong

gis bgos pa'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'thun pa'o/ /'phags pa'i rigs dang 'thun pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bstod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'o zhes phyag dar khrod pa de dag la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i

gzhis bdag la mi stod/ gzhan la mi smod do/ /bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang bral bas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas lha rnams 'du ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis phyag bya ba yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis gzengs bstod par bya ba yin

te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya chen po rnams la spyod pa dman tshegs kyis ci zhig

bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten gyi yid dang sbyor ba yin te/ stobs kyi mthu thob pa rnams 'jig rten dang 'thun par spyod kyi stobs kyi mthu ma thob pa rnams ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' stobs

kyi mthu ma thob pas ni nyon mongs pa ma langs pa'i gnyen po bsten par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya chen po la mos sam/ 'on te dman pa la mos pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i lan gsol du bdag gis tshig mi phyin to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni mos pa la smos pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos gzigs pa/ bde bar gshegs
